content.rendered:
We’re getting closer to releasing 0.80.0 on WordPress.org. Most of the issues reported by our community in the support forums have been addressed, so this version is even more fun. ;)

You can download it from Trunk at WordPress.org >

Please keep testing and giving us feedback… we love it!

excerpt.rendered: We’re getting closer to releasing 0.80.0 on WordPress.org. Most of the issues reported by our community in the support forums have been addressed, so this version is even more fun.
